[cultist][tablet]：-3. If this token is revealed during a fight or evade attempt against a [[Chess]] enemy, reveal another token.
[elder_thing]：-2. -4 instead if you are at a [[Shadow]]  location.

flavor: Your arrival on the front lines spurs movement from the far side of the board. If any truce was maintained until now, the time for it has passed.
name: Opening Strategy
text: [[Chess]] enemies gain hunter and "生成 - Seventh Row or Eighth Row." 強制 - When a [[Chess]] enemy would resolve the hunter keyword, consult the Chess Movement section in the campaign guide.
back_flavor: Your preparations to cross the center line have been carefully observed. The red pieces storm out from the darkened castle. You have noticed from the first attackers that the pieces still somehow obey what you would consider normal chess rules. Is the Red King still guiding their movements? Or is it such a core part of the pieces that they move instinctively?
back_text: Search 遭遇牌堆 and discard pile for a King's Shadow and spawn it at the lead investigator's location. Shuffle 遭遇牌堆 if it was searched.

flavor: The battle on the chess fields continues with increasing fervor. Red pieces flow out from the darkened half of the board with surprising speed to meet your approach.
name: Countergambit
text: [[Chess]] enemies gain hunter and "生成 - Seventh Row or Eighth Row." 強制 - When a [[Chess]] enemy would resolve the hunter keyword, consult the Chess Movement section in the campaign guide.
back_flavor: The red pieces pause their fighting to bow and kneel as an imposing figure emerges from the shadowy veil. The Red Queen, her face somehow both hard and soft at once, gazes hatefully across the fields at you as power swells within her. Shadows pour from her robes, and she begins to mutate further. "Strike down the invaders!" she bellows, racing toward you with tremendous speed.
back_text: If the Red Queen is not in play or in the victory display, spawn her at Eighth Row.

flavor: As the Red Queen advances upon you, the shadows spread with the speed of a wildfire toward the white castle. Darkness begins to claw at the sky, and each piece of landscape appears like a blackened copy of itself.
name: File Occupation
text: [[Chess]] enemies gain hunter and "生成 - Seventh Row or Eighth Row." 強制 - When a [[Chess]] enemy would resolve the hunter keyword, consult the Chess Movement section in the campaign guide.
back_flavor: The red army relentlessly presses back against your charge in a seemingly unending flow of soldiers. As they push back, the amassed shadows sweep past you towards the castle of the white chess pieces and crash against it like a tidal wave. Your fighting for conquest turns to a fight for survival as you flee the battlefield.
back_text: Each undefeated investigator who has not resigned takes 1 physical trauma from fighting off the red army. (→結局1)

flavor: You can barely make out the silhouette of the Red King's castle amid the darkened clouds ahead of you. It will be quite an ordeal to make it across the ruined half of the chess board fields.
name: Across the Board
text: [action]：Move an unengaged [[Chess]] enemy according to its movement rules in the campaign guide. 目標 - When an investigator enters the Eighth Row，推進場景。
back_flavor: Through the swirling darkness, you charge up the steps of the red castle and burst through the towering double doors. The Red King sits at the opposite end of a grand hall, seated languidly in a grand skeletal throne. He does not make any motion as you enter, though the shadows leaking out of his hooded cloak begin to pour with increasing volume.
back_text: 查看冒險日誌。If the investigators went through the looking-glass,spawn the set-aside The Red King (Obscure Overlord)at Eighth Row. 否則，spawn the set-aside The Red King (Tenebrous Tyrant)at Eighth Row. If the Red Queen is not in play or in the victory display, spawn her at Eighth Row.

flavor: The Red King utters no commands or cries of alarm, but his minions pursue you into the castle as the shadows try to blot the light out behind you. Your only recourse is triumph, here and now.
name: Absolute Pin
text: [action]：Move an unengaged [[Chess]] enemy according to its movement rules in the campaign guide. 目標 - If The Red King is defeated，推進場景。
back_flavor: You strike the Red King with every bit of courage you can muster, and all at once, the red pieces freeze and the shadows' advance halts. The entire area seems suspended in time for a moment before the king slips down out of his throne and splays on the floor before you.

flavor: The White King does his best to rally his pieces into action, but they largely ignore him.
name: First Row
text: [action]：撤退. "This is a losing game." [action]：Heal 1點傷害and 1點恐懼 (limit once per game)。
back_flavor: The majority of the white chess pieces cluster inside the white castle, hesitant but clearly worried as they gaze down towards the shadowy far side of the board.

flavor: The outer walls of the white chess pieces offer some protection against the attacking red pieces.
name: Second Row
text: [reaction] After you successfully evade an enemy, choose and discard a card from your hand: Move the evaded enemy to either the Third Row or the Fourth Row.
back_flavor: The white chess pieces' fortifications end at this square. Beyond lies an open battlefield.

flavor: The third row is open and spacious, with many well-kept roads running through it.
name: Third Row
text: [reaction] After you move to this location as your first action: Move to a connecting location.
back_flavor: The wide fields are perfectly square, though dense hedge rows block your path to any other column of this chess board.

flavor: A white knight roams near the border of the fifth row, muttering to himself in confusion.
name: Fourth Row
text: 強制 - After you reveal Fourth Row: 將放在一邊的The White Knight into play at this location and shuffle both set-aside copies of Absent-Minded into 遭遇牌堆. [free] Discard the top card of your deck: Shuffle any other card from your discard pile back into your deck (每輪限制一次)。
back_flavor: The sun shines down in scattered rays as the darkness from the far half of the board begins reaching across.

flavor: Your body seems to fight you with each step forward, as if your own shadow were pulling back on you.
name: Fifth Row
text: 強制 - 在你翻開Fifth Row後：Reveal the top five cards of your deck and draw each weakness revealed. Shuffle your deck.
back_flavor: A deep split in the field separates the fourth and fifth rows. Shadows churn at the bottom, making it uncertain just how deep it is.
back_text: As an additional cost to enter Fifth Row, investigators must spend 1 [per_investigator] clues as a group.

flavor: Shadows coil in from the sides of the square, as if trying to hedge you in.
name: Sixth Row
text: 強制 - 在你進入Sixth Row後：檢定[agility](3)。如果你失敗，立刻結束你的回合。
back_flavor: The terrain grows rougher with each step you take into enemy territory.
back_text: As an additional cost to enter Sixth Row, investigators must spend 1 [per_investigator] clues as a group.

flavor: You find it hard to keep your footing as you make your way across the dim landscape and through the broken defenses of the red chess pieces.
name: Seventh Row
text: 強制 - When you reveal Seventh Row: Search 遭遇牌堆 and discard pile for a [[Chess]] enemy and spawn it engaged with an investigator at this location. If you searched 遭遇牌堆, shuffle it.
back_flavor: The outer fortifications of the red chess pieces lie crumbling, though the many corrupted pieces still lurk within them.
back_text: As an additional cost to enter Seventh Row, investigators must spend 1 [per_investigator] clues as a group.

flavor: The castle of the red king lies in ruins at the edge of a massive cloudy void, torn apart unevenly by hungry claws.
name: Eighth Row
text: 強制 - While there are 1 [per_investigator] or fewer clues at this location, as an additional cost to investigate this location: Choose and discard a card from your hand.
back_flavor: A roiling blanket of darkness veils the final square almost completely.
back_text: As an additional cost to enter Eighth Row, 調查員必須以團隊為單位，花費1[per_investigator]個線索。

flavor: The Cheshire Cat might be offended if you mention curiosity killing anything.
name: Distant Square
text: 顯現 - 在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Curiosity。 調查員不能進入Distant Square。 [free]如果The White Knight在Distant Square，對他造成1點恐懼：準備The White Knight，並將他移動到任意已揭示地點。在任意地點的調查員都可以啟動此能力。
back_flavor: You can spot chess pieces moving to this square out of the corner of your eye, but it seems a world away.
back_text:
調查員不能進入Distant Square。
[action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：翻開Distant Square。調查員以團隊為單位，可以從任意地點啟動此能力。

name: The White King
text:
[reaction]在你執行抽取行動後，消耗The White King：抽取1張額外的卡牌。位於The White King所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。
[reaction] After you take the resource action, exhaust The White King: Gain 2 additional resources. 位於The White King所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。

name: The Red King
text: 警戒。 在調查行動期間，The Red King不能進行趁亂攻擊。只要Eighth Row上有至少1[per_investigator]個線索，The Red King+2攻擊，且獲得反擊關鍵詞。 強制 - 在調查員從Eighth Row發現任意數量的線索後：對The Red King造成等同於該線索數量的傷害。
traits: Wonderland. Shadow. Chess. Royalty. 精英

name: The Red King
text: 警戒。 The Red King cannot make attacks of opportunity during investigate actions. While there are more than 1 [per_investigator] clues on Eighth Row, The Red King gets +2 fight and 反擊。 強制 - After an investigator discovers any amount of clues from Eighth Row: Deal X damage to The Red King where X is the amount of clues he or she discovered.
traits: Wonderland. Shadow. Chess. Royalty. 精英

flavor: "...all she remembers is, that they were running hand in hand, and the Queen went so fast that it was all she could do to keep up with her: and still the Queen kept crying `Faster! Faster!"
name: The Red Queen
text: 獵物 - [agility]最低的調查員。 你與The Red Queen交戰時，你不能啟動[free]能力或打出有快速關鍵詞的卡牌。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. Chess. Royalty. 精英

name: Discovered Attack
text: 顯現 - Put Discovered Attack into play in your threat area. 強制 - 在你進入有敵人的地點，或有敵人進入你的地點後：在該敵人上放置1個毀滅標記。 [action]：檢定[willpower] or [intellect](4)。 如果你成功，discard Discovered Attack.

name: King's Shadow
text: 冷漠。獵手。King's Shadow不能進入交戰狀態。 強制 - When you would leave King's Shadow's location: King's Shadow attacks you. [reaction] After you successfully investigate or discover clues from your location: Deal 1點傷害to King's Shadow.

name: Overextended
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。 This test gets +1 difficulty and peril if you are at a [[Shadow]] location.如果你失敗， 受到1點傷害(2 damage instead if there is a [[Chess]] enemy at your location)。 If you failed by 2 or more, lose 2 resources.

name: Promotion
text: 禍害。 顯現 - If there are no [[Chess Soldier]] enemies in play, Promotion gains 湧動。 否則，choose a [[Chess Soldier]] enemy and attach Promotion to it. The attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 evade, and +1點恐懼. If the attached enemy is a Pawn, it gets an additional +1 fight, +2 health, and +1 evade.

name: Zugzwang
text: 顯現 - Attach Zugzwang to your location. 強制 - When you would leave attached location, you must (choose two different options): - 受到1點傷害. - 受到1點恐懼. - Discard 1 card from hand at random. - Lose 1 resource. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Zugzwang.

name: The White Knight
text: Investigators at The White Knight's location get +1 to all skills when resolving effects or during attack, evasion, or investigate attempts on or against [[Chess]] cards. [action]談判：將The White Knight移動到一個連接地點。 強制 - 當調查階段結束時，如果The White Knight處於準備狀態且位於Distant Square：將他移動到任意investigator的地點。

flavor: "There he goes! Right on his head as usual!"
name: Absent Minded
text: 湧動。 顯現 - Exhaust The White Knight and move him to Distant Square.

name: Lucid Nightmare
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-2. -4 instead if there is more total damage and horror on Alice than on your investigator.
[cultist]：-2. -4 instead if you are at a [[Wonderland]] or [[Shadow]]地點.
[tablet]：-2. -4 instead if there are 3 or fewer [[Wonderland]]地點 in play.
[elder_thing]：-2. If Gurathnaka is at your location, reveal another token.
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-3. -5 instead if there is more total damage and horror on Alice than on your investigator.
[cultist]：-3. -5 instead if you are at a [[Wonderland]] or [[Shadow]]地點.
[tablet]：-3. -5 instead if there are 3 or fewer [[Wonderland]]地點 in play.
[elder_thing]：-3. If Gurathnaka is at your location, reveal another token.

flavor: The stability of Arkham continues to degrade as it had when you first entered Wonderland. Darkness spreads from the north half of the city, and with it, Gurathnaka and its minions. Shadows greedily consume everything in their path like a forest fire, gorging and growing steadily stronger.
name: Burgeoning Darkness
text: Alice Liddell cannot take control of the Cheshire Cat. Enemies cannot engage, attack, or target Alice Liddell when moving via the hunter keyword. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時：Move Gurathnaka one location towards the location with the most investigators. 強制 - If Alice is defeated, (→結局2).
back_flavor: Alice leans against a partially demolished building as another ungodly roar rips through the air. Her efforts are slowing the shadows from crossing over into Arkham, but her body and spirit are being quickly overtaxed.
back_text: Deal 1點傷害or 1點恐懼 to Alice. If resolving this effect would defeat Alice: (→結局2).

flavor: Gurathnaka leads its shadows in consuming any and all material they can claw apart; animal, vegetable, or mineral. A dark void radiates out in their wake, emptier even than the void of space.
name: Mass Consumption
text: Alice Liddell cannot take control of the Cheshire Cat. Enemies cannot engage, attack, or target Alice Liddell when moving via the hunter keyword. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時：Move Gurathnaka one location towards the location with the most investigators. 強制 - If Alice is defeated, (→結局2).
back_flavor: Reality wavers and ripples inconstantly, unbalancing you in its shifting state. You rise quickly, but Alice takes several more moments to push herself unsteadily back up. If the shadows grow in strength much further, then Alice may not survive the strain.
back_text: Deal 2 damage and/or horror to Alice. If resolving this effect would defeat Alice: (→結局2).

flavor: The fading glow of twilight and the few remaining street lights in Arkham light your way as you hurry as never before. When darkness overtakes the city, it will be the end not only for you, but all life on Earth.
name: Last Light
text: Alice Liddell cannot take control of the Cheshire Cat. Enemies cannot engage, attack, or target Alice Liddell when moving via the hunter keyword. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時：Move Gurathnaka one location towards the location with the most investigators. 強制 - If Alice is defeated, (→結局2).
back_flavor: The sharp popping and shattering of glass sounds over the rumble of the crumbling landscape. With all now artificial light gone, you can only watch in despair as the fading glow of twilight darkens to night and the shadows claw at you from all sides.
back_text: 每位調查員 who has not resigned is defeated.

flavor: Shards and echoes of Wonderland pervade the familiar districts of 阿卡姆. The only way you will be able to banish the shadows is to purge the parts of the city overlapping with Alice's dreams. It is finally time for you to leverage what you learned in your journey.
name: Separating Fantasy
text: 強制 - 當調查階段開始時：調查員以團隊為單位，必須從Alice的手牌中選擇並打出1張卡牌。Then, you may move Alice to any connecting location. [reaction] After you successfully attack Gurathnaka: Discover a clue at your location. 目標 - If there are no [[Wonderland]]地點 in play, you must immediately advance.
back_flavor: With Alice attempting to repel her own dreams from the real world, you focus on your memories of the people and places of 阿卡姆. Each routine sound, unique scent, and memorable hallmark of the city that you can recall helps to separate the two worlds and redefine the boundaries. As you peel away Wonderland from Arkham, the impossible jumble that you left behind in the Northside and Downtown districts begins to rearrange. The overwhelming darkness begins to concentrate at the spot where Alice's house once appeared, each shadow being drawn inevitably toward it. Gurathnaka stutters, as if attempting to exist in multiple realities at once, bellowing with abominable fury as it too is drawn toward the growing void.
back_text: 將放在一邊的Northside, Downtown, Easttown, and Vacuous Void locations放置入場。 Move 每位調查員 and weakness enemy to Easttown. Flip Gurathnaka and move it to Vacuous Void. Discard all other enemies and remove each other location from the game.

flavor: Though the void draws the shadows and last vestiges of Alice's dream, Gurathnaka resists its pull, its continued howls reverberating in your bones. Its indescribable voice speaks to a primal fear within you, but the only way to survive this nightmare is to banish the Eater of Dreams.
name: Darkest Before Dawn
text: 強制 - 當調查階段開始時：調查員以團隊為單位，必須從Alice的手牌中選擇並打出1張卡牌。Then, you may move Alice to any connecting location. [reaction] When you would discover any amount of clues, even if your location has no clues on it: You may place that many of your clues on Gurathnaka instead. 目標 - If there are more clues on Gurathnaka than it has remaining health，推進場景。
back_flavor: Amid the rushing vacuum of the darkness through the wavering fissure, Gurathnaka claws at Arkham greedily. Each time you repel the monster, drawing from your recent experiences to weaken its grip through the dimensions. Alice focuses every fiber of her will on maintaining stability while you unravel the portal and sever Gurathnaka's attachment to 阿卡姆. Weary minutes pass, until finally, a breakthrough! The shadowy abomination falls through the endless void, still reaching toward you with empty hunger. "It's through!" Alice cries, though you cannot make a reply before the rift sutures itself shut, and a ripple bursts forth from the point of exit, knocking you off your feet.

flavor: The streets of the Merchant District blend with the features of the steep valley where the Tweedles met in their earlier battle.
name: Merchant District
text: [action]：Investigate. Double Merchant District's shroud for this test. 如果你成功，discover an additional clue.如果你失敗， discard a card from your hand at random and lose a resource (limit one success per turn)。 強制 - If there are no clues on Merchant District: Flip it.

flavor: The Merchant District returns to its lonely state, no less abandoned at night for all the chaos around it.
name: Merchant District

flavor: The Miskatonic river carries a salt air, and the waves wash over the riverbank as if it were Wonderland's Sea of Tears.
name: Rivertown
text: [action]：檢定[agility](3)。 如果你成功，Rivertown gets -3 shroud until the end of the phase.如果你失敗， 受到1點傷害(limit 1 success per round)。 強制 - If there are no clues on Rivertown: Flip it.

flavor: The waters of the Miskatonic have receded, though the surface still churns with each ripple of reality.
name: Rivertown

flavor: Miskatonic's campus is segmented and alternates between colored sections in a pattern like the chess field of Wonderland.
name: Miskatonic University
text: [action]：Investigate. When you initiate this test, discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a weakness, draw it. 否則，you get +X [intellect] for this test, where X is the cost of the discarded card. 強制 - If there are no clues on Miskatonic University: Flip it.

flavor: The university's ivy halls have returned and reordered, but the invasive darkness still pervades the campus grounds.
name: Miskatonic University

flavor: The stately architecture of French Hill overlaps with ornate stonework that you recognize from the Queen of Hearts' castle.
name: French Hill
text: French Hill gets -3 shroud while there is any amount of doom on enemies at French Hill or treacheries attached to French Hill. [free] Place a doom on an enemy at French Hill or a treachery attached to French Hill. 強制 - If there are no clues on French Hill: Flip it.

flavor: French Hill once again sits in its usual splendor, though its gambrel roofs rattle with the rumbling throughout the city.
name: French Hill

flavor: The woods outside of Arkham twist into strange shapes that you only recall from the much stranger Tulgey Wood.
name: Uptown
subname: Not Out of the Woods Yet
text: [action]：Search your deck or discard pile for a weakness and draw it. If you drew a weakness, discover 2 clues on Uptown (每回合限制一次)。 強制 - If there are no clues on Uptown: Flip it.

flavor: Arkham's woods unravel and twist back into their familiar but foreboding forms, giving you little peace of mind.
name: Uptown

flavor: Southside's quiet roads are cluttered with silverware, crockery, and half-eaten refreshments from the Tea Party table.
name: Southside
text: [action]：檢定[willpower](3)。 如果你成功，Southside gets -3 shroud until the end of the phase.如果你失敗， 受到1點恐懼 (limit 1 success per round)。 強制 - If there are no clues on Southside: Flip it.

flavor: Southside once again sits in quiet seclusion, in stark contrast to the roiling chaos just north of it.
name: Southside

flavor: Despite its proximity to the breach between the two worlds, Easttown is relatively untouched by the chaos.
name: Easttown
text: 強制 - After you fail a skill test by 2 or more at Easttown: Place 1 clue on Easttown from the token bank. [action]：撤退. There is no possible hope of repelling Gurathnaka, but there may still be a way to save yourself.
back_flavor: Easttown has always been considered one of the safer districts due to the police presence, but in these circumstances, it's just as vulnerable as the others.

flavor: If you can find the first cracks of Wonderland's incursion, then perhaps you might be able to seal it for good.
name: Downtown
text: 強制 - After you resolve a test at Downtown where 3 or more skill icons were committed: 受到1點恐懼.
back_flavor: The region of Arkham where the trouble all began. It has mostly returned to an unaltered state, suprisingly.

flavor: Remnants of the earlier chaos still linger in Northside. They may be the key to fully closing off the connection to Wonderland.
name: Northside
text: 強制 - After you resolve a test at Northside where 3 or more skill icons were committed: 受到1點傷害.
back_flavor: When you left Northside behind in your journey to Wonderland, you weren't sure if you'd ever see it in a recognizable state ever again.

flavor: It will take all of your faculties to seal this rift between worlds and save Arkham from certain annihilation.
name: Vacuous Void
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate Vacuous Void: Discover an additional clue.
back_flavor: A wide tear in reality hovers far above the city. Wind rushes in toward it, but only the invading shadows seem to be affected by its pull.

name: Gurathnaka
text:
龐大。
Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.
Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions.
Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

name: Gurathnaka
text: 龐大。 Gurathnaka gets +6 [per_investigator] health. Gurathnaka cannot be defeated by damage. Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果Gurathnaka處於準備狀態：在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。

name: Gurathnaka
text:
龐大。反擊。
Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.
Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions.
Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

text: 龐大。反擊。 Gurathnaka gets +6 [per_investigator] health. Gurathnaka cannot be defeated by damage. Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果Gurathnaka處於準備狀態：在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。

<Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.

Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

text: 龐大。反擊。 Gurathnaka gets +6 [per_investigator] health. Gurathnaka cannot be defeated by damage. Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果Gurathnaka處於準備狀態：在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。

text:

Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.
Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions.
Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

text:

Gurathnaka gets +6 [per_investigator] health.
Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.
Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions.
Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

text:
龐大。反擊。警戒。
Gurathnaka cannot be damaged.
Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions.
Investigators cannot use Alice's ability or elder sign effect during attack or evade attempts against Gurathnaka.

name: Gurathnaka
text: 龐大。反擊。警戒。 Gurathnaka gets +6 [per_investigator] health. Gurathnaka cannot be defeated by damage. Gurathnaka cannot make attacks of opportunity during move actions. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果Gurathnaka處於準備狀態：在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。

name: Insatiable Shade
text:
獵手。 警戒。
Insatiable Shade's damage and horror values are 1 less than Gurathnaka's damage and horror values.

name: Limits of Control
text: 顯現 - For each weakness in Alice's hand, deal 1點傷害or 1點恐懼 to her. For each copy of Shadow Strain in Alice's hand, deal 1 additional horror to her. If there are no weaknesses in Alice's hand, Limits of Control gains 湧動。

name: Living Eclipse
text:
龐大。
Living Eclipse's location gets +2 shroud. Each location connected to Living Eclipse's location gets +1 shroud.

name: Mental Exhaustion
text: 顯現 - Put Mental Exhaustion into play next to the agenda deck. Investigators (including Alice) cannot draw cards during upkeep. As an additional cost to take the draw action, 受到1點恐懼. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard 1 copy of Mental Exhaustion. (Max once per round)

name: Shadowy Gorger
text: 冷漠。 生成 - Furthest location from all investigators. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果Shadowy Gorger處於準備且未交戰的狀態：在其上放置1個毀滅標記。

name: Shattering Psyche
text: 顯現 - Put Shattering Psyche into play next to the agenda deck. 強制 - After an investigator discovers 2 or more total clues or places 2 or more total clues on an enemy during his or her turn: Deal 1點傷害or 1點恐懼 to Alice. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard a copy of Shattering Psyche. (Max once per round)

name: Spatial Stutter
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。如果你失敗，結算以下文字(選擇一項)： - 移動到一個連接地點，並受到2點傷害。 - 移動到一個與你所在地點連接次數等於2的地點，並受到1點傷害。 Then, if there are more clues on your new location than on your previous location: 受到1點恐懼.

name: Weakening Boundary
text: 顯現 - Attach Weakening Boundary to the location with the most clues. 強制 - 當調查階段結束時：Place 1 clue (2 clues instead if there are 3 or 4 players) on the attached location (從供應堆拿取) or 放置1個毀滅標記 on Weakening Boundary (自行選擇)。 If it is act 2, you cannot choose to place clues. [action]：檢定[willpower](3)。 如果你成功，discard Weakening Boundary. 強制 - If Weakening Boundary's location is flipped, discard Weakening Boundary.

name: Tenebrous Nightmares
text: 顯現 - Put Tenebrous Nightmares into play in your threat area. You cannot draw cards or gain resources during the upkeep phase. [action][action]：Discard Tenebrous Nightmare.

flavor: "Curiouser and curiouser."
name: Alice Liddell
text:
[reaction] When an investigator at Alice's location would test with any skill: Use Alice's base [intellect] for that skill instead (limit once for 每位調查員 per round)。
[elder_sign] +0. Choose and shuffle a card from your discard pile back into your deck. Any investigator at Alice's location may use this effect instead of their own elder sign effect.
back_text: Deck Size: 24. Deckbuilding Options: Follow the Alice's Assistance section in the campaign guide to construct Alice's deck. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): All cards included are determined by the investigator's choices. Additional Restrictions: Cannot be used by players.

name: Alice's Courage
text: Put Alice's Courage into play next to Alice. [reaction] When an investigator engages or becomes engaged with an enemy: That investigator may draw a card. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Alice's Courage.

name: Alice's Compassion
text: Put Alice's Compassion into play next to Alice. [reaction] When an investigator heals any amount of damage and/or horror: That investigator heals 1 additional damage or horror (自行選擇)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Alice's Compassion.

name: Alice's Patience
text: Put Alice's Patience into play next to Alice. [reaction] After an investigator resolves a test where he or she committed a skill card to that test: That investigator may draw a card. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Alice's Patience.

name: Alice's Curiosity
text: Put Alice's Curiosity into play next to Alice. [reaction] After an investigator moves: That investigator gets +1 on all skill tests until the end of his or her turn (limit once per investigator)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Alice's Curiosity.

name: Alice's Intuition
text: Put Alice's Intuition into play next to Alice. [reaction] When an investigator would play an event: That event gains fast (limit once per investigator)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Alice's Intuition.

name: Alice's Reason

name: Lack of Courage

name: Lack of Patience

name: Lack of Curiosity
text: Put Lack of Curiosity into play next to Alice. 強制 - After an investigator moves: That investigator gets -1 on all skill tests until the end of his or her turn. 當一輪結束時，discard Lack of Curiosity.

text: Put Lack of Intuition into play next to Alice. 強制 - When an investigator would play an event: That investigator must spend 2 additional resources. 當一輪結束時，discard Lack of Intuition.

name: Lack of Reason
text: Put Lack of Reason into play next to Alice. 強制 - The first test 每位調查員 performs gets -X, where X is the amount of clues he or she controls (max -4)。 當一輪結束時，discard Lack of Reason.

flavor: The White Rabbit leaps past you, tapping his pocket watch frantic盟友. "There are still seconds to spare! Use them quickly!"
name: Still Ticking
text: Put Still Ticking into play next to Alice. Move all doom from all enemies and treacheries in play to Still Ticking. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Still Ticking.

flavor: A broken pocket watch lies on the ground in front of you, stuck just one minute to twelve o'clock.
name: Running Out of Time
text: Put Running Out of Time into play next to Alice. 強制 - After an investigator fails a test against an enemy: 放置1個毀滅標記 on that enemy (limit once per investigator turn)。 當一輪結束時，discard Running Out of Time.

flavor: The Walrus and the Carpenter are suddenly walking beside you, providing many insights that are strangely useful.
name: Talk of Many Things
text: Put Talk of Many Things into play next to Alice. 每位調查員 other than Alice may immediately draw up to 3 cards. Investigators may choose not to discard cards during the upkeep phase. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Talk of Many Things.

flavor: But answer came there none —
name: Shed a Bitter Tear

flavor: "More tea?" The Hatter and the March Hare reach from above and below you, offering refreshments.
name: The Best Butter
text: Put The Best Butter into play next to Alice. [free] During an investigator's turn, that investigator may play an asset from his or her hand, paying half its cost, rounded up (limit once per investigator)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard The Best Butter.

flavor: Cups and saucers fly, hurled at the shadows by the sole remaining occupant of the tea party table.
name: Wasn't Very Civil
text: Put Wasn't Very Civil into play next to Alice. [free] During an investigator's turn, that investigator may play an asset from his or her hand, paying its cost (limit once per investigator)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Wasn't Very Civil.

flavor: A cracked tea set sits on the ground before you, smeared with butter, jam, and blood.
name: Empty Table
text: Put Empty Table into play next to Alice. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，每位調查員 discards an asset he or she controls or discards two assets from his or her hand (自行選擇)。然後，discard Empty Table.

flavor: The Queen of Hearts is suddenly beside you, flanked by dozens of card guards and still bearing a grudge against the shadows.

text: Put The Queen's Justice into play next to Alice. 強制 - 當調查階段結束時：造成1點傷害to each enemy in play. For each enemy defeated by this effect, 每位調查員 other than Alice may gain 1 resource. 當一輪結束時，discard The Queen's Justice.

flavor: You happen across an enormous pool of blood with the Queen of Hearts' crown half-sunken into it.
name: Broke Her Crown
text: Put Broke Her Crown into play next to Alice. 強制 - When an enemy would enter the encounter discard pile or victory display: Place that enemy back on top of 遭遇牌堆 instead. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Broke Her Crown.

flavor: Astonishingly, the Snark stands before you once again, ready to assist you with its many talents.

flavor: "But if ever I meet with a Boojum, that day, In a moment (of this I am sure), I shall softly and suddenly vanish away— And the notion I cannot endure!"
name: Softly and Suddenly Vanished

traits: Wonderland. 疏忽. 陰謀. 悖論

flavor: "O frabjous day! Callooh! Callay!" He chortled in his joy.

text: Put Galumphing Back into play next to Alice. [reaction] When an investigator would take any amount of damage and/or horror: That investigator takes 1 fewer damage or horror (自行選擇)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Galumphing Back.

flavor: "Beware the Jabberwock, my son! The jaws that bite, the claws that catch!"

flavor: Tweedledum and Tweedledee stand shoulder to shoulder, ready to assist in their own meager way.

text: Put Brothers in Arms into play next to Alice. [reaction] When a card would enter an investigator's discard pile: That investigator may place it on top of his or her deck instead (Limit once per investigator)。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，discard Brothers in Arms.

flavor: The living Tweedle focuses his grief and anger at the shadows that indirectly caused him to lose his brother.

flavor: Cracked pots, dented washtubs, and shredded pillows lie in a heap, each piece speckled with blood.

flavor: You find a shattered sword lying on the ground, alongside several dented pieces of armor.

flavor: "Curiouser and curiouser."
name: Alice Liddell
text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would test with any skill: Use your base [intellect] for that skill instead (limit once for 每位調查員 per round)。
[elder_sign] +0. Choose and shuffle a card from your discard pile back into your deck. Any investigator at your location may use this effect instead of their own elder sign effect.
back_flavor: It was often said that Alice lived in her own little world. Alice had to agree of course, as she had been there several times before. She knew that Wonderland was a dream, but it all seemed as real to her as her native England. This belief attracted the attention of a shadowy being named Gurathnaka who saw opportunity in Alice's dreams. As Alice grew, it tried to solidify her belief in Wonderland until it began to merge with the real world. Alice attempted to outrun the spreading chaos, until her journeys brought her to Arkham, Massachusetts where a group of investigators freed her mind from Gurathnaka's influence. Alice has vowed to repay their deeds by helping to solve as many of Arkham's bizarre happenings as she can.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards with "uses (secrets)" level 0-2, up to five other level 0 Mystic and/or Survivor cards ([mystic] and/or [survivor])。 Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Mysteries of Wonderland, Lost in Thought, 1 random basic weakness.

flavor: "And how do you know that you're mad?"

text:
Alice Liddell deck only.

[free] During a skill test you are performing, 受到1點恐懼 and exhaust Mysteries of Wonderland: You get +X skill value for this test, where X is the highest number of secrets on an asset you control (max +4)。

Set your base [intellect] to X, where X is the number of secrets on Lost in Thought. Ignore any other game effect that would change your base [intellect]. [free] Move 1 secret from an asset you control to Lost in Thought. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，place 1 resource token on Lost in Thought from the token bank, as a secret.
